directions: In a large pot over medium heat, combine the cranberry juice, sugar and water. Bring to a boil and stir until sugar is dissolved.
Place the cinnamon, allspice and clove into a cheesecloth bag and tie shut. Add to the liquid and simmer 20 minutes.
Remove spice bag. Just before serving, add fruit juices. Serve steaming hot.
ingredients: 6 fluid ounces frozen concentrated fruit punch
1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
title: Wassail II
